name: MAD Maze
description:
Find a spinning marker in 20 mazes! You must know that there is one difficulty - you do not see where you are!
But this is not scary, because your resourcefulness and patience will help you find the marker and go to the next level!
The classic look of the game will return you back to childhood and will not leave you indifferent!
20 exciting levels, 15 music tracks will cheer you up. You will have fun!
